website_summaries.verdict: It's fairly basic and doesn't have a lot of quality issues, but if you need help with setup or have questions, you may be disappointed.
pros: A mid-priced model w/standard features: remote, various ports, and a swivel/flip design
Headrest mount is durable and easy to set up
cons: Customer support has received some criticism

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff, I would highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a birthday gift for my son. It is ideal for car rides as well, when the main TV is being watched by others, my son can take his little DVD player and watch it when and where he wants. I have attached some pictures of it being used in the car. The holder works very well. Good stuff, I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Eve

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive at a cost
customer_reviews.text: Wired my van to use two of these players with DVD head unit; works flawlessly. Sound from these units is great, along with the multiple features available through them, such as various inputs and types. Picture not great unless viewed from correct angle. However, when using SD card, would only play avi; mp4 videos came up as a "codec not compatible" with this player. The audio would play, but no video. Disappointing, because I then had to convert everything, which is very time consuming, and description states that mp4, one of the most popular formats, plays on this device.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan R

customer_reviews.title: Quality for a great price
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased 4 of these for my grandchildren (ages 10 down to age 3) to use for a very long car trip. They were wonderful! We strapped them on the seat in front of each child and gave them the remote. We recharged before the trip home. The remote was easy for all to figure out and use except the 3 year old. Shipped promptly, easy to set up, sound and picture quality great. I also purchased headphones so each child could watch their own movie. They made the long driving trip so much more enjoyable for everyone. I recommend them to anyone who needs a portable DVD.
customer_reviews.author: birdie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good quality
customer_reviews.text: We've had this for about a year and our daughter enjoys it. The battery life is pretty good and the set up is pretty simple. Nice quality screen and we've had no issues with it. I just wish there was a power button on the remote control that it comes with. The power button is on the side so it's not convenient when I'm driving and need to turn it off. Overall, very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CFHLV

customer_reviews.title: Too many limitations
customer_reviews.text: Frankly I wouldn't recommend this player. It has far too many limitations for my taste. The video size must be 720 or less, the file size must be under 1 GB, and only a few CODECS are supported (and not the major ones used today). If you want this player to watch pre made DVDs then I think you'll be alright, but if you want this to watch movies or videos you have downloaded or made then they probably won't be viewable without conversion.
customer_reviews.author: T. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Makes road trips a lot easier
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for the kids to have for a couple big road trips. We have taken two long (over 12 hours) trips with these, with another one coming up soon. They are awesome. They work great, no issues with them, kids plug in their headphones and each get to choose whatever they want to watch. Can take them down off the mount easily and pass it up front for us to use, too. Have had no problems at all. Just what we were hoping for. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: The volume keeps getting louder then sometimes so soft I ...
customer_reviews.text: The volume keeps getting louder then sometimes so soft I can barely hear it. The remote worked for about a week, now nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I didn’t have to go digital!
customer_reviews.text: I love this player! When I thought to search for this on Amazon, I feared no one made them anymore. Having a vast CD/DVD library, I wanted to take some along with me when taking trips by car. Why spend the money repurchasing them digitally when you have them in your possession already? Wasn’t looking to waste money that way. The picture quality is very good, the remote is easy to use. I found no issues against this player.
customer_reviews.author: Geri B.

customer_reviews.title: great package deal if you still own dvd's and want ...
customer_reviews.text: Works - we needed it for long car trips and I didn't want to share my other devices. So far it's working well and does what we need it to do. It is a little cumbersome but that's just normal for dvd player. Thank goodness for the remote as otherwise you'd have to take the whole thing out of the car case to adjust anything. Overall, great package deal if you still own dvd's and want to watch while traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Teall

customer_reviews.title: Excited
customer_reviews.text: We love it! Great sound and viewing. Fantastic addition to our traveling supplies. So portable and can play our CD's since our new car does not have a "CD player". Would recommend this product to everyone. And, excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well with the only low point being the sound
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. As with all flat screen screens, the speakers are very weak. I bought this to use while I use my rowing machine in different locations away from electrical outlets. At the loudest player sound setting, the rowing machine sound drowns out the sound. I resolved the problem by attaching some external speakers. I still would recommend this DVD player to others.
customer_reviews.author: William D. Green

customer_reviews.title: It still works 2 years later!! (Wild boys...)
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for home or car!! And it still works!!! I bought this a year or two ago - I think 2!! My younger son is not careful w/anything (walking energy & impulse...) and uses this to go watch in my room away from big brother when he needs a break or 4 hour each way visits to relatives. I am so glad I bought it! The seat hanging thing did not hang properly in my car but he just holds in lap & fine.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Powers

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!!!! This is the second DVD player we have from this company after they had to replace the first because the battery exploded! Now, the second one has a battery that exploded too!!! My 4 year old uses this!!! Shame on you for selling a dangerous product! It deserves zero stars, but Amazon doesn’t allow that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great player, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great little player. Took it on a road trip for the kids. It worked great. The screen died yesterday and I emailed them about it. Within 24hours they shipped a replacement without a problem. My only complaint is that I wish the DC power cord was at a right angle. Our plug bent when we mounted it between the car seats for the kids. Granted that's not how they intended it to be used so it's our fault. Still, a great player.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Braun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Since I had never heard of this brand I didn't know what to expect, but I liked the features and thought that I'd give it a try I'm happy to report that I'm very pleased. It's easy to operate and has good picture quality. I had a problem with the remote so they are sending me a new one. You can't beat good service! I highly recommend this company and product.
customer_reviews.author: Janice P

customer_reviews.title: Great DVD player
customer_reviews.text: This is a great DVD player for the car. My son loves to watch his Mickey Mouse DVD’s while we are in the car. I did have an issue with the player after a few months, but the customer service was amazing!!!! And within a few days of reaching out they rectified the issue and my son was back to his Mickey Mouse DVD’s in no time! You really can’t put a price tag on that level of great customer service!!!! Very happy I chose this one!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Price is fair, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a 5 star rating but haven’t used the control yet otherwise I really think it’s great. Clear pictures easy to understand not difficult to work, that’s important because most gadgets like this are difficult for seniors to use. I feel the price and the quality of the item is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for long car rides--DVDs ONLY no blu ray
customer_reviews.text: This was a life saver for our 8-9 hour car trip. No flaws so far. Liked the remote feature for when it's docked in the headrest. Hopefully this product has some longevity, because we are happy with the purchase. We like how it has a car charger and you can hook it up to your TV at home. EDIT--This isn't really a deal breaker for me, especially since DVDs are cheaper and we do not use it as often. But this is a DVD player ONLY. It does not play blu rays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little DVD player
customer_reviews.text: Been using for 2 months now and works great. Was a little skeptical to buy an off brand electronic device like this, but have no complaints. The screen turns 360 degrees giving it tons of viewing angles, and with the car straps my son is now loving the long car rides. I have a f-150 and it fits my headrest perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Liked it because it doesn't have a lot of buttons ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for what we needed., Gave it to my 3yr. old Grandaughter for Christmas. Liked it because it doesn't have a lot of buttons for her to push and mess up. She puts her own movies in it and is entertained for hours. Works well anywhere and she takes it in the car on trips. Purchased the car charger also which has a long enought cord to reach from the back up to the charge outlet in the front. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne H. Morrow

customer_reviews.title: great for road trip
customer_reviews.text: we bought this product for my 3yo for a long road trip. The picture quality is good. as others noted, the remote can be tricky to operate when the unit is mounted on the headrest, but not too much of a hassle. Other DVD players seem to have a longer battery life, but the unit comes with car adapter if needed. I would purchase again for our needs.
customer_reviews.author: GolfersDS

customer_reviews.title: Remote broke before first use...
customer_reviews.text: Just received this afternoon. Turned dvd on and picture seems clear. Sound is good. Remote would not work out of box, I went to investigate reason why. Upon removing battery the battery encasement broke. One of the main reason for purchasing this DVD player was the fact it had a remote. Now that won’t work. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Player
customer_reviews.text: Great portable player. Purchased to take on a trip with us so that my 3 kids could watch movies. It works well, no issues- great sound and graphics. Screen turns around and can hang on the back of the car headrest.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Michelle River-Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Very nice DVD player and car mount for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The DVD player works well, sounds good enough, and the screen looks good. The headrest mount fit perfectly and works great. Negative: when mounted in the headrest mount, the remote sensor is in a very awkward position and doesn’t work well. Also, the file format when reading movies from a flash drive is VERY picky. I tried 4 different formats, resolutions, and encodings and could never get it to play a movie from a flash drive.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: my children very like this PORTABLE DVD PLAYER.I do not want them to play games, so I can not give them IPAD and computer to watch movie.because of them like the game more.I want them to watch the documentary to improve them.this one is perfect to solve my problem.it has an important features is that can connect the U disk and SD card.it is wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our beach trip this summer that came with a 5 hour car ride. We wanted to keep our 2 year old occupied and it certainly did! We kept it plugged in for the most part since the battery didnt last too long. The remote is a bit of a challenge to get it to do what you actually want. It is annoying to have to take the whole thing out to change the DVD but it does keep him from trying to take it out himself. We still have ours in the car and it definitely comes in handy if we ever run into traffic or take a long trip! I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a very nice DVD player.
customer_reviews.text: The DVD player is very nice and a great price. We have only had it for a few weeks so I hope that it holds up well. We are using it for our granddaughter when we go on trips. The only downside is that you have to take it out of the holder to change DVDs, otherwise it is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: bev.y

customer_reviews.title: Great DVD player for road trips.
customer_reviews.text: Product is great and a great price. Even better was the company making the product. When Amazon sent me a "Used" product by mistake, the UEME company immediately sent me a new one to replace it. Rarely do I encounter such great customer service. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Would have been good if listing said "People who bought this often ordered
customer_reviews.text: Functions as advertised. Headrest Holder will also function as sun visor holder for CD play. Unfortunately Audio out cord terminates as RCA jacks rather than 3.5mm AUX IN for playing on car speakers. Cables are inexpensive add ons. Would have been good if listing said "People who bought this often ordered..." The nearly full-function remote does not have a power switch.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Eisenberg

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Yes, it is bulky and there are slimmer and sleeker players available elsewhere. I bought this to use with a teaching program that needed the use of earphones, quick ability to stop and restart without losing my place in the lessons. Unless you have such needs, there are less expensive and lighter more portable units out there.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Stanzione MD

customer_reviews.title: Video and audio quality are amazing, big screen
customer_reviews.text: This is our second purchase of this wonderful DVD player. The first one works flawlessly and as described, so we bought another one for our toddlers. It is perfect for our toddlers who need entertainment during long road trips. It is simple for them to operate on their own and we are really impressed! This is a versatile product for use in the vehicle or at home. I was delighted with the big screen and it swivels to make viewing more comfortable. The picture quality is also great and the sound is true. The remote has all the buttons on it which is a bonus! Great product for great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The case (that goes on the back of the seat) broke during the first use so now it doesn’t fit right. Disappointed with the case but the DVD player works good. Edited: The company contacted me based on my first review and replaced our broken headrest at no cost. Great customer service and definitely went out their way to make it right. They care about their product and making their customers happy. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: farms4awhile

customer_reviews.title: Battery is awful
customer_reviews.text: This is my second DVD player I purchased from this company- the first one was GREAT, battery lasted 3.5 hours just like advertised. This next one I received I had kept feeling like, "Didn't I JUST charge this thing?" but chalked it up to 'Mom Brain.' We just took our first long car trip recently, and YUP it wasn't Mom-brain, the battery on the DVD player I received only lasts 45 minutes.. :( :( 45 minutes?!?! My toddler was NOT happy and neither was anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: KAG

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a used unit
customer_reviews.text: Player works just fine. Looks like a used unit. Scratches all over the outside. Also cannot find a customer care number anywhere to let them know.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Tomaino

customer_reviews.title: portability
customer_reviews.text: most computers do not have a DVD player anymore so this is great for watching instructional video or whatever
customer_reviews.author: jn19

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a gift for my 10 month old grand daughter a year ago. The picture has been great, and is used for for long commute trips for work and vacation. I would have never thought it would has lasted this long but it is still working. The baby and their parents love it and would be a nightmare,, when traveling, without it. I and my daughter would it again! It has given good service, picture is vivid and battery life has been impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Hale

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Entertainment for Long Trips
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for the car. Good picture quality. Easy to use. Comes with a seat headrest holder so you don't have to purchase one separately and worry about being the right size. Long battery life. Great value. Purchased 2. The only negative is the receiver for remote is located in a poor location when using it on the seat headrest. Have to point at a certain angle.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Rattles in the quiet
customer_reviews.text: This DVD player works great except for the rhythmic rattling. I wanted this to watch dvds with headphones while my wife slept but it’s impossible. It makes way to much racket and wakes her up. Love the remote and it will play scratched discs without a problem but quiet watching is not possible with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product for a long trip with a toddler It works great! Very easy setup and has been a wonderful addition to our vehicle to help keep our little one entertained on long road trips. Only complaint is that the remote is hard to use when the player is in the seatback case but can still be used when pointed at the top of the player. I'm happy with my purchase and actually just ordered another one as a gift to a family member.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Took a 9 hour road trip. Definitely charge it before use. The battery lasted at 3.5 hours before plugging up the car charger. The picture is large for viewing and the quality is clear.
customer_reviews.author: OneGod

customer_reviews.title: Player stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my granddaughters first birthday and she has enjoyed it so much... until it stopped working. Very disappointed because it came highly recommended. Contacted customer service to see if they could help. Guess I will see what happens . I’m going to have to purchase another because it keeps her occupied why she travels 2 hours to my house.🙁
customer_reviews.author: kierstin

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: It is a perfect dvd player for kids, especially when traveling in an automobile or anything for that matter. My grandson absolutely loves his new dvd player.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Love the 180 degree swing and the 10
customer_reviews.text: Love the 180 degree swing and the 10.1 is really easy to view...... Have not tried the in vehicle charger or set up yet, but soon.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: cd player car
customer_reviews.text: friend bought not me she loved it worked perfect for her
customer_reviews.author: Barbbe

customer_reviews.title: Happy Wife
customer_reviews.text: My husband likes to view sports. I, however, not so much. My husband bought this for me for Christmas so that while he is watching sports I can watch one of my favorite movies.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Works well and has a lot of battery life!
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for the kids for a 14 hour drive, we made it about half way before having to recharge them which was amazing! Also I love the fact that they turn around and can fit on the back of the headrest, it became a life saver when they wanted to watch something but also were tired to hold on to it. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzy

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive but very effective
customer_reviews.text: This player meets all of my expectations. Simple to operate, picture quality very good, easy to install in the car. Keeps my one year old grandson occupied and happy watching his Elmo videos anytime he is in his carseat, for one trip over three hours so far.
customer_reviews.author: David B. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Peace and traffic.
customer_reviews.text: I resorted to this for my three year old. We are in traffic at times for almost two hours and this solved the frustration and meltdowns he was experiencing. With an additional purchase of toddler headphones, I am able to listen to the news as I drive.
customer_reviews.author: anitap

customer_reviews.title: The car charcher isnt long enough
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for long trips it's a great size comes with a holder so you don't have to buy your own. The only thing I didn't like is that my baby is still raiding the car facing backwards and the the car charger it's long enough.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery life only 3 hours
customer_reviews.text: It says the battery lasts 4 hours and the user guide says it only lasts 3 hours.this stoped working after a couple months I do not recommend this DVD player
customer_reviews.author: lori barrie

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Unit was great! Plays the kids dvd's as expected. I wish there was a way to turn the unit off via the remote instead of the toggle on/off switch on the player. Otherwise I'm very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's worth it and inexpensive too!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with quality resolution and functionality. It was a gift and he loved it. Great for headrest mount.
customer_reviews.author: Elmer P.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: worked well. Can't turn on and off with the remote though so that's annoying
customer_reviews.author: lara

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this. Its so cute. I bought it for my daughter. I would definitely recommend this. Now i need to buy some dvds!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Best picture!
customer_reviews.text: Great Picture, easy to use. Seems very sturdy compared to the one it is replacing! Really the best picture I have seen on this small a unit, sound is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product is great! My toddler enjoyed using it on our cross ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! My toddler enjoyed using it on our cross country flight, and it has been very helpful on long road trips. Good picture and sound. And the customer service is fabulous! I lost the wall charger when we moved, and customer service was great and sent me a replacement right away. Highly recommend this product and company!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Small

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 7 year old grandson while on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for our 7 year old grandson while on a 2,000 mile trip... easy to use ..... small enough to easily tuck away...
customer_reviews.author: teacher

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It is decent, just takes a while to load sometimes and the battery life isn't great. Recommend buying a power inverter for use on road trips.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Niedermeyer

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money spent
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this so far. Cheaper than having a DVD player installed and it's portable. It does have a aux out if you wanted to play it over the car speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas H. Graham

customer_reviews.title: They hold about a 6 hour battery charge and have excellent sound. The picture is pretty good too
customer_reviews.text: So far, they are working well. They hold about a 6 hour battery charge and have excellent sound. The picture is pretty good too. Note: there is only 1 headphone outlet on the device.
customer_reviews.author: NicoleJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived on time and in perfect condition. Great picture quality. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service from UEME
customer_reviews.text: We had an issue with the dvd player, but UEME sent a new one in less than a week and it works great!!! Great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Alissa K

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. Great picture when playing DVD
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. Needed something user friendly. He is not tech savvy. This is perfect. Great picture when playing DVD. Good sound quality. Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: philly1

customer_reviews.title: Came out of the box working great! Used it on a week long road trip
customer_reviews.text: Came out of the box working great! Used it on a week long road trip. Never had an issue. Kept our son entertained for hours! Company sent me an email at time of delivery that included a guide, but we never needed it. Everything seemed self-explanatory.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Just got today! Everything works and it is great! Large screen and sound and picture quality is great also! Def reccomed this product! Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: Great product but easily breakable thin straps on DVD headrest case.
customer_reviews.text: Portable DVD Player was perfect. No issues at all and worked exactly for what I needed it for....traveling in the car with kids. The only thing was the DVD headrest case straps broke within a few days. We were able to finagle keeping the DVD player in the case and usable but the straps on the case holding the DVD player in are very thin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great player with great features
customer_reviews.text: Love this DVD player! We bought it upon seeing a family member have one and loved how vibrant the picture quality was and that it came with a holster to put up on the headrest in the car for our child to watch. A bonus is that it works off either battery alone or being plugged in so it keeps playing when we get out of the car instead of shutting off like our other one did. What a great product!
customer_reviews.author: dbsmith08

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Worked beautifully for having an 18 hour road trip with 5 kids. Battery easily lasts longer than a single movie, and having both a car and a receptacle charger is very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel

customer_reviews.title: It works there very well with clear tones and good volume.
customer_reviews.text: I use this I n my car all of the time. It works there very well with clear tones and good volume.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey O.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Updated review: Had an issue that caused me to send it back and get another. Had no issues with the new DVD player. Works great, occupies the little one on long car rides and the video quality isn't too bad. PS: the customer service was awesome at fixing this issue. Thumbs up!👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Slaughter

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The DVD player is good! Given as a gift to my sister for her new baby to have a distraction in the car. Only complaint is no Bluetooth connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Hardin

customer_reviews.title: Great travel DVD for the little ones!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set up for long travels for the little ones! The holder fits perfectly on the headrest. Great quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Hutchinson

customer_reviews.title: Nice to have a remote with it
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few weeks. It works perfectly. Nice to have a remote with it. We like it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: the audio is good and the video is clear
customer_reviews.text: So far this portable DVD and CD player has been fabulous. It is lightweight, the audio is good and the video is clear!!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Bularzik

customer_reviews.title: Good for what it was bought for
customer_reviews.text: Battery life short, and do not like that when connected to tv it still plays on dvd screen but other than that i love this product .Good for when internet is out like during last hurricane Michael.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Urdialez

customer_reviews.title: Tv
customer_reviews.text: Love it, kids just watch tv on those long rides
customer_reviews.author: Kat Silva

customer_reviews.title: It keeps her happy while she is in her car seat
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for my grand baby that rides in the back seat of our car. It keeps her happy while she is in her car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Picture quality is great. My 9 & 11 year olds set it up in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Lusher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and comes with the headrest mount holder
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent portable DVD player. I purchased it because my daughter and I are planning a few road trips this summer and this DVD player will allow her to relax and enjoy the rides. It is just the right size and I liked the fact it came with the headrest mount holder.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk Diggler

customer_reviews.title: works wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter and grandson LOVE this product. so that I am thinking about ordering another. Saves me lots of fighting and produce was just as described.
customer_reviews.author: cindykinsey

customer_reviews.title: Great in the car
customer_reviews.text: My radio went out in my Jeep & the quote to replace/fix it was close to a $1000.00. So I needed to find another way to play my audio books on long trips. The UEME was the perfect fix! Plays without skipping even on bumpy roads and the sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Mead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The size of the screen and the picture is great!! Def easy to work
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Page

customer_reviews.title: arrived on time

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This unit is fun and easy to use. It plays for several hours before needing charging.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great DVD Player
customer_reviews.text: This was great DVD player for my 5 year old to travel with, he was able to work the DVD player by himself, the battery life is about 4 hours, I ended up leaving it plugged into the charger for the whole trip.
customer_reviews.author: Scrappy83

customer_reviews.title: it does not work at all!
customer_reviews.text: the battery on the one I got my last for five minutes the controllers on the payer panel do no respond and the same goes for the remote controller also in short it's just no good a nd while playing it jumps from one set of video to the oyther
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: such a nice player..I ordered a second for the grandkids
customer_reviews.author: bolt fan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a family with children that are impossible to ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a family with children that are impossible to please on long rides in the car. Bought one for a vacation trip and didn’t hear a sound from my children the entire way there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great dvd player for personal use
customer_reviews.text: Great dvd player for personal use. Comes in handy when power is out. We use it mostly for watching a movie when we go camping.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Still working a year later
customer_reviews.text: Awesome DVD player still working a year later. We leave it attached to the headrest year round
customer_reviews.author: Trevor

customer_reviews.title: I like the ease for using this dvd
customer_reviews.text: I use this dvd player in the car for trips with grandkids. I like the ease for using this dvd, clear picture and no skipping even on bumpy roads! I did purchase speakers so they could hear the movies better.
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Mullis

customer_reviews.title: I'm really impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful picture, clear sound and large screen. Great product at a fantastic price.
customer_reviews.author: Athena

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids for the car.. it’s loud and shows very clearly.. Would highly recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth R.

customer_reviews.title: It was great while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: This was a great little DVD player for my daughter when we went on small road trips. I had it delivered in December and it has already quit working. I don’t know if this came with a warranty, I can’t remember. But hopefully I can get a replacement soon!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle deGraauw

customer_reviews.title: Great portable player!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice player. The kids enjoyed a lot on an 2 hour trip, will put it unto real test on an 12 hour road trip, but so far we like it. Only complaint it’s the sound, it’s kind of low but you can use a cable to hook to the car sound system and it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Katinha

customer_reviews.title: Remote Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Got the DVD player yesterday and the remote doesn’t work even installed new battery. Got it for use in the car with headrest installation but not much good without the remote. Contacting the customer service dept. of the company will see what they say
customer_reviews.author: cynthia Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great little DVD player!
customer_reviews.text: Great Buy! Bought this for our 1st family vacation..13 hr drive in car and worked perfect! Great quality and clarity on screen. All around great buy for the price u cant go wrong! I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Blaire Carr

customer_reviews.title: Just bought this one after a prior purchase from same manufacturer
customer_reviews.text: Have had product from Eume before and quality is superb.nice, clean DVD presentation.
customer_reviews.author: sydora robinsin

customer_reviews.title: Good while it lasted- just didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 - one on my daughter's account (for her child) - Nice picture and sound but only lasted a couple of months. Now nothing. Emailed the company - no response. Past the return date on that one. Still have one - just wondering if I should go ahead and return it before the return date runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Keith

customer_reviews.title: Always order from Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: It met all my expectations very well. I purchased it as a gift 🎁
customer_reviews.author: Deb Moad

product_meta.title: UEME DVD Player Portable with 10.1 Inch Swivel Screen, with Car Headrest Mount Holder, Remote Control, Car Charger, Power Adaptor, Built-in Rechargeable Battery, Region Free Players (Black)
feature_bullets: HD DVD PLAYER PORTABLE - Top-loading DVD player; 10.1 inches large screen; Built-in high capacity rechargeable lithium battery; Anti-shock and light weight make it easy to carry; It includes a wall charger and a car charger, you can plug in the charger for unlimited work time. It will work up to 5 hours per fully charged if using the battery powered. It is not only home DVD player, but also a travel DVD player

SIMPLE TO SETUP AND USE- You can control the DVD player by the buttons and the remote control. It can be easily operated by any age groups and user friendly. The device has 2 built in 1.5W speakers and 2 earphone jack.

PLAYING DVDs CDs and MULTI-MEDIA FILES: Compatible DISC will accept DVD DVD-R DVD-RW CD CD-R HDCD Music-CD Audiobook-CD Mp3-CD Picture-CD VCD EVD SVCD; You can also enjoy playing the supported multimedia files by the USB port and SD card slot (Max support 32G)
POWER OFF RESUME FUNCTION- This DVD player will start from the same point where you have left off. This fucnction can be turned off in setup menu if you do not need it.

COMES WITH A CAR HEADREST MOUNT HOLDER- The car headrest mount holder is a bag with 2 adjustable straps. It is customized for foldable DVD player to install to a car headrest without making any changes to your car. There is a velcro on the top of the bag for easily removing the DVD player.

specifications.Special Features: Anti shock, Region free, Comes with a car headrest mount holder
